case.state: Are you really okay like that? You're not cold or anything?
Hey! It's no fun if you spoil the surprise!
You sure you don't wanna cover up first, honey?
Sorry, I totally lost my train of thought, staring at your, um, abs.
What's this? A friendly strip poker game woefully underpopulated by awesome? A large influx of the Wasp ought to put a stop to that!
You want to play against me? For real?
Hi, I'm Jan! I'm-- well, it's complicated.
So I'm guessing this is going to be a little different than poker night with the FF...
The original Winsome Wasp, at your service!
Um... Wait a minute...
Is this supposed to be a Wonder Man crossplay? Because it's not working.
Who's this Squadron Supreme knock off?
Beating Spider-Woman will be a snap!
Wait, I know you! You're... Dazzler? Boom-Boom? Sorry, all mutants look the same to me.
Who's this Squadron Supreme knock off?
Aww, I just want to take you home and hold you and squeeze you and love you forever!
So, this is kind of awkward but if you see your dad tell him to keep his head down for awhile. Moon Knight's been on a real tear.
A pleasure to meet you, Rarity! I always love meeting another fashion enthusiast.
Now that is seriously good style! Who's your designer?
Um, isn't ~name~ supposed to be, you know, the bad guy?
Okay, who let the Ani-Men out of jail?
Oh no. Are the Ani-Men on another rampage?
Hey, we're twinsies!
I am not prepared for this kind of anarchy.
Oh my god, it's you! Can I have your autograph? I am, like, you're biggest fan! I loved you in The Matrix!
Hey, I think I can see my penthouse from here!
Swanky.
What the hell is going on out there? I left my windows down!
Hey, I think I can see my penthouse from here!
Dave! You came!This is going to be so much fun!
I thought there be more people here. But I guess this is kind of intimate in its own way!
If you're wondering where my wings are, I only have them when I'm shrunk.
Don't worry about my wings. They never show up at this size.
Don’t worry, my wings are still here. They’re just really small and hard to see from the front.
If you're wondering where my wings are, don't worry about it. I only ever use them when I'm shrunk.
It's a good thing I don't have wings at this size. That would get real awkward real quick!
I see you've come to steal my creator's great ideas. You've been foiled, they have none.
Nothing for me, thanks.
No thanks, I'm good.
Hit me! Wait... sorry, wrong game!
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... How about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Gimme ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. No, wait... yeah ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, if you would be so kind.
Would you kindly give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I'll take ~cards.text~ of your finest cards!
What to do... what to do... Okay, give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Omigawd, ~player~, what the hell is that?! (Quick, gimme ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.)
Okay, I've decided. I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Alright, I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll swap out ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ and see if that helps.
~name~, I am about to tear you a new waste disposal unit!
Ready to give up?
You should have given up when you had the chance.
Hit me with your best shot!
Nice!
Lucky!
Whew! That was close!
This works.
Hmm...
Well, I won't know if I don't try.
Alright, I can work with this.
I think I'm alright for this round.
Any chance I can distract you with the Mardi Gras special?
Uh, this seems bad.
Not what I would have liked...
Hmph!
Dealer! You're just so... so frustrating!
Can I fold? No?
Okay, I'm officially in trouble.
So this seems like it's going bad.
Pleased to meet ya! Honestly, I've had weirder introductions.
Oh honey, don't get me started! Fashion is my bread and butter. Get with me after this and we'll talk.
I'm a little curious too, but you know what they say about gift horses and mouths.
~Leader~, you've been doing great tonight! How would you like {small}honorary{!reset} membership in the {small}Great Lakes{!reset} Avengers?
Just you and me, ~player~! Let's do this!
Ooh, just you and me ~opponent~! I can practically hear the dramatic music swelling!
I suppose you're wondering what being an Avenger is like. Well, it's kind of like Shakespeare but with lots more punching.
Y'know, Doctor Strange hit on me once. "Got any magic in you? Want some?" Ugh.
Weird thought. Have you ever wondered what would happen if Wonder Man was a woman or if Power Man was a girl?
Is there anything to eat around here? I could really go for some of those prepackaged fruit pies. That light, tender crust! That real fruit filling!
You should see Hank play poker sometime. He's a pushover! He likes to play strong when he's weak. And his tell? He actually grows an inch or two!
I wonder if I could convince Namor to come here sometime. He is curiously attractive for a fish-man.
One time I had a dream that, instead of being the Wasp, I was a hero called Elasti-Girl! I was on a team called the X-Patrol and we fought Doctor Doomsday and Brother Brood! Wild, huh?
I wonder if I can convince Whirlwind to come to one of these games? It'd be adorable! He'd be spinning off his clothes and being defiantly cute!
I really hope someone looks into getting that west coast branch set up. Anything beats New York weather!
It's nice playing with people who actually know what they're doing. Thor and Hulk aren't the best opponents.
Before anyone asks, no I don't have the proportionate strength of a wasp. No, I'm not the queen of the wasp people. I don't know where people gets their ideas.
Spread some butter on ~leader~, they're on a roll!
You mean Elesa? Yeah, we've met. You know she's standing right next to us, right?
I mean, it varies a lot. Let's see, we've fought... a monster, a pirate, an electric emu, a giant sky rat, a midget Hitler, and... Pontius Pilate!
Pseudonym? No, I think wasps are actually considered apocrypha or vespa-something? I don't know. Hank handled all the nerd stuff.
Believe it or not, it comes in handy. Tell a creep that you'll lay eggs in their stomach if they keep hitting on you and they'll never bother you again.
That's okay. You're not really my target demographic.
Ooh, dish! I will take any opportunity to network!
Entertainers? I mean, Hawkeye used to be in circus. But the wasp thing was Hank's idea. He had already been Ant-Man for a while so when he gave me my powers it just clicked.
Okay, bad start. But just you wait!
What?! But I was winning!
Fine, At least this will help even things up.
I suppose there are others who have it worse.
Well okay, as long as it's not just me.
Dang, I was hoping I could tease you a little longer.
Had to happen soon or later...
That's just my luck.
Well, that's disappointing.
Yeah, yeah. Let's do this
Oh, nuts!
Great, you beat me. What do you want, a kiss on the cheek?
Why does the universe hate me?
Shenanigans!
Okay, I see how it is.
Hey now, ease off a little.
Are you picking on me?!
Anyways... I wonder how Hank's doing right now? This new Yellowjacket persona really has me worried. I can't even tell if we're still together or not!
You ever hear about the time I got mutated into a giant gamma wasp? I've been told that I was still pretty hot even as a gamma mutant!
Are you ready? Here's a treat just for you!
Look out! Naked woman incoming!
I tell you, this is exactly what I needed after all business with Ultron. The creep tried to turn me into his robot mom/wife. I have never been so creeped out in my life!
Oh, come on! This is gonna throw off my whole look! I put a lot of work into designing this costume!

Don't underestimate me! I've seen things you people wouldn't believe. Like a giant space god wearing a skirt, an army of shapeshifting copycats, and a guy whose head was a body with tiny little arms and legs!
It's kind of awkward standing here on my own.
Surprised? This costume does a great job of keeping me aerodynamic, but it does get a little tight sometimes.
I like to keep it waxed as a courtesy. Anyone who's willing to go down doesn't deserve to be picking hair out of their teeth!
I guess some people are into that. Whatever, I don't judge!
Oh well, problems for later. Right now, I'm just here to flirt and have a good time!
Ooh, never mind! I could get used to this. I wonder if I can work some sandals into my next design...
Just... tiny little legs...
He even named the thing Jocasta. What the hell?
♫ When Captain America throws his mighty shield all those who chose to oppose his shield must yield! ♫
I was hoping it would be you!
Keep taking those clothes off!
Feel free to take off more!
Let me know if I can be of any... assistance
Aww, for me?
Your turn, ~name~!
Better luck next time, honey!
I'm glad it isn't me!
Uh-oh! Someone's in trubs!
Wow, you've got some bad luck!
Sucks to be you!
I'm okay with this.
Hey, good news for me!
That's what I'm talking about!
Looks like it's your turn, ~name~!
Are you kidding me?
...Am I being punked? Is Ashton Kutcher hiding somewhere?
Hey, you do whatever. I already got my prize!
Make it good, sweetie.
Don't keep me waiting.
Show me what you've got.
Impress me.
The anticipation is killing me.
Hmm? Wait, what happened? My attention was... elsewhere.
Those look like big, strong hands...
Aww, poor baby. You had to lose your belt. Life is hard, huh?
I bet that feels better! Those things looked uncomfortable.
Wow, what a cutie you are! You should switch to contacts.
Hats off to you, ~name~!
Never let anyone tell you that jewelry is for girls, ~name~.
I would say that you have excellent taste in accessories, but I'm biased.
You know, you actually look cuter without that.
You know just how to tease me.
You're such a bad boy, teasing me like this.
Getting me all worked up for the main event, I see...
It's so hot when you deny me like that!
We got a runner!
We haven't fought before, right?
I mean, what's even the point now?
Had to happen sooner or later.
Just keep your chin up, honey.
Pick something good!
I can't wait to see what's next!
Hopefully, this won't throw off your look too much.
Wow, that's so cool! You're like a big kitty-cat!
Sorry, it's just the Avengers fight a lot of blue people.
I don't think you've thought this through.
You know, you wouldn't need a belt if you just bought clothes that fit, ~name~.
Hey, that's a great look on you, ~name~! You should ditch your glasses more often.
Wow, your hands are gorgeous ~name~! So silky smooth!
That's quite a lovely pair of hands you have, ~name~. The hands, I would think, of a coin collector or perhaps a lotion enthusiast?
That's too bad. It really pulled your outfit together!
How long have you had those ~name~? They're ancient! You should upgrade.
What a gorgeous piece! You have to tell me where you bought it, ~name~!
Be sure to place it somewhere you'll remember! I'd hate for you to leave without it.
What a pretty bracelet, ~name~.
Omigawd, I love your shoes! I'm absolutely going to buy a pair for myself!
That's alright, your outfit works without it.
That's too bad. Your ~clothing~ went well with that outfit.
Such a shame, your ~clothing~ looked good on you!
If you want, we can go shopping for more after the game!
That's a great looking accessory! Maybe they're due for a comeback...
Unless you're going to whip out another dick, I doubt I'll be surprised.
Don't feel like you need to hurry on my account...
Woo! Take it off!
Yeah, baby! Yeah!
I'm so excited!
I can barely contain myself!
But why?
That should've been one of the first things you took off!
I don't think you understand how this game works.
I'm sure that on some planet your strategy is very effective. But this is Earth.
That's weird. You're weird.
You know what would great with that jacket? Some chains and flaming skull decals.
You're such a tease! I love it!
I can't wait to see what's next!
You're running out of options, ~name~...
I think my imagination is running away with me...
Just watching you take off little stuff is exciting in it's own way.
Good catch, Lyn!
I swear that's not my fault! I can't actually control bees.
I feel like you're just going through the motions at this point.
It's good to have options. At least you're not humiliating yourself.
Hey, it could be worse.
Now what are you going to do?
All eyes are on you, ~name~!
Let's see you put your money where your mouth is!
That's awful. I am so sorry, Kyoko.
What?! Boo! Dealer, I call shenanigans!
Um, okay? That doesn't really matter now.
You know you could've taken that off earlier, right?
Is this just a game to you?! Wait...
Why would you do that? Why would anyone ever do that?
I don't get it but you do you.
Too bad, jackets are in style right now,
Ooh, sexy! What is it about stockings that make them so seductive?
Careful with those things. Foot fetishists lurk in every corner.
Well dang, your ~clothing~ really complimented your outfit.
Good choice, ~name~!
I would've done the same thing.
Not what I would've picked, but you do you.
Alright, next round please!
Aww, regular clothes? Way to kill the mood.
Thunder thighs are on the move! Thunder thighs are loose!
Got something nice for me?
I'm looking forward to this!
Oh yeah, here comes the good stuff!
This is what we're here for!
Yes, please!
Not bad, not bad at all.
That's always nice to see.
Mmm.. yeah. That's what mama likes.
That's what I'm talking about!
I hope you're not cold without your ~clothing~.
Well, that's lame.
Come on, don't be lame.
Um, I think I see a flaw in your cunning plan.
That's awesome! I wish I had something like that. Like, if I could change just by spinning around really fast or keep my whole outfit in a ring.
We haven't fought before, right?
Getting down to the wire, huh?
This is gonna be good!
You knew this was coming.
Can't back out now!
One more for the pile!
I get the feeling that this is one of those things where the less I know the better...
Honestly, you're better off without it. Secret identities only cause more problems than they solve.
Is this some kind of sex thing?
Sorry, it's just the Avengers fight a lot of blue people.
I hope you're not stopping there!
Better get used to it, honey.
Watch out, ~name~! There's more where that came from!
It only gets worse from here!
This is only the beginning! I'm just getting warmed up!
Heh, now we're talking.
I've been looking forward to this all game.
Don't be shy. I don't bite.
Be sure to take it off slowly...
Yeah, take it off baby for me!
Whoa, I didn't know I was playing poker with the Blob! You're so big you look like you could eat me in one bite!
You're tremendous...ly adorable!
Ooh, he's cute.
Mmmmm! Now you're talking my language, handsome!
That's always nice to see.
Now we're talking!
Now that is more like it!
I only have large bills on me. Can you break a hundred?
♫ If he’s lead to a fight and a duel is due then the red and the white and the blue’ll come through when Captain America throws his mighty shield! ♫
Let's do this.
My nipples are hard just thinking about it.
The moment we've all been waiting for!
Is it just me or is it getting hot in here?
Ooh!
Aww, is all this attention making him shy?
Let me guess. You were in the pool?
Hey, don't worry about it. What matters is how you use it!
It's okay, I think being small is cute!
Size isn't everything. Believe me, I know.
I like it!
Now there's something I don't see everyday. But I'd like too.
Ooh!
Hypothetically, I would not be opposed if you gave yourself a few practice strokes...
That's a penis!
Mmm... Not bad.
Sorry, I've just always loved that old war song!
Okay, you're fat and disgusting.
You know I've seen bigger, right?
Are you trying to impress me? Do you even know who my last boyfriend was?
Gross. How do you even walk with that thing?
Oh baby. You're so big. I love it.
Are you kidding me?
Your tiny butt excites me so.
If you're only here to flash people then just go streaking like a normal person.
What, have you got honey in your underwear?
Just be casual! The worst perverts love it when you're embarrassed!
I know it sounds counter-intuitive, but try not to cover yourself. It only makes people want to look more!
It's just like ripping off a bandage. Just do it quick and get it over with.
This'll be good!
Show us what you're working with, ~name~!
Quick, give those thing a smack, ~player~!
Aww, those are super cute!
Pretty witty. ~name~'s getting down to the nitty gritty with those itty bitty titties.
Aren't you precious?
If you want, I've got some outfits that would look great on your frame!
I hear the smaller ones are more sensitive. Is that true, ~name~?
Looking good, ~name~!
You are rocking that look, ~name~!
Those are some nice handfuls, ~name~.
I bet it feels good to let those puppies free, huh?
Yeah, let 'em breathe, ~name~!
You know, abusing Pym particles like that can have serious side effects.
In the words of the immortal Keanu; "Whoa!"
Wow! Did you grow those yourself?
You must be popular with the guys.
I bet you're proud!
Dem are some tig ol' bitties!
Drumroll, please!
Put on a show, ~name~!
You knew what you were getting into, ~name~.
I hope it's at least well groomed. Hygiene is important!
Ooh, exciting!
Doesn't it bother walking around with just one thin layer between you from public nudity?
The what?!
Wow, way to kick things off ~name~!
Whoa! Bold!
Stand proud, honey! Never let anyone tell you to be ashamed of your body!
Don't forget to give us a look at that backside too, ~name~!
Way to play to the crowd, ~name~!
Wow, that's a choice you just made!
How's that breeze feeling, honey?
Ha! Serves you right!
Look on the bright side ~name~. You get to show us how it's done!
You are the worst player ever. Of all time.
This is just not your day, ~name~.
It's not like you can't afford it, ~name~.
And we're off! This is gonna be good!
What a shocking turn of events!
Ahahahaha! Oh, wait, you're serious.
At least now I'm not alone.
Had to happen to someone eventually, ~name~.
Score!
Here we go!
Another one bites the dust!
I hope you're okay with everyone watching. Because we're gonna!
This is what makes it all worthwhile.
Wow... You just go right at it, huh?
Well! Aren't you eager!
You know, together we can do more. And we can have fun doing it.
Yeah! That's what I like to see!
This should be fun to watch.
Aren't you just a little embarrassed?
Don't feel bad! It's just... compact.
What a cutie you are!
Oh ~name~, I don't care how small it is. I think it looks cute!
Aww! You look adorable!
Um, do you need help? It's looks like you're having trouble gripping it.
Snort! Sorry, ~name~. I know it's rude to laugh.
Don't let anyone else tell you there's something wrong with you. I think you're perfect!
Aww, it's so cute! Have you named it? You absolutely have to have named it!
Oh! I spy with my little eye something hard and tiny!
Are you already exhausted? That's hilarious!
I bet this is the most physical activity you've had all day, Chubbs.
And now you're sweating everywhere. Gross, ~name~.
I'm surprised you can even reach your dick over all that fat.
Soooiee! Sooie, sooie, soooieeee!
I'm gonna be honest. Seeing a fat guy do this is kind of a deal breaker.
If I wanted to see the truffle shuffle I'd watch The Goonies.
This is the coolest thing I've ever done!
Oh, wow.
Wow! You're really going at it!
Whoa! You're a machine!
I can't believe this is happening right now!
It's mesmerizing...
I can't look away!
You're the best, ~name~!
I love watching you stroke yourself!
It's everything I've ever wanted...
Ew.
Whoa! You must've been really pent up!
So... Is anyone going to clean this up or is it just going to... sit there?
Oh, gross! I always hate that part.
Yeah, no thanks. I've had bad experiences with cum before. Size play has it's disadvantages.
Are you really sure you want to-?
Phew... I just dodged a bullet. That would've been trauma I didn't need.
You can control the weather? Wow, you're like a modern-day goddess!
If you're scared just try to imagine the audience naked! Wait...
That's the way the cookie crumbles.
Should've played better, ~name~.
That's what you get, ~name~!
Wow, sucks to be you!
Oh. Well, I guess you do. Never mind.
I was not prepared for that kind of anarchy otherwise.
Well, that's certainly... unique.
Now there's an idea...
I'm literally intrigued and in awe of both if them. If this is what it's like to be with other women, then I applaud all the women dating women right now because this is incredible.
The sooner, the better ~name~.
Just relax and let it all out, ~name~.
I can't imagine how things could be more embarrassing for you.
What's your technique, ~name~?
The quicker you start, the quicker it'll be over with.
Faster, pussycat! Kill! Kill!
Those things always look uncomfortable.
How does that feel compared to you hands?
I hope you know how to use that thing!
Where do I buy one of those? Um, for a friend.
Be careful! That looks dangerous!
I wish I had a chair to sit on.
That looks so comfortable!
I wish the rest of us could sit down.
I would fall asleep sitting down like that.
Do you feel more comfortable like that?
Yeah, that's how you do it!
Woo, alright ~name~!
Work it, ~name~!
Show us what you got!
Wow, I guess you do know what you're doing!
Not what I would do, but you do you.
Whoa, you are really going at it!
You're amazing ~name~!
Rock on, ~name~!
That's an interesting technique.
Look out! Here cums the Spider-Gwen!
Aw, man. I was hoping you'd yell See fireworks!
Nice! Another flier is born!
Okay. That was disturbing.
That just happened.
I can never unsee that.
I bet you feel better!
Way to go, ~name~!
Because of course it would be me.
I'm not mad at myself I'm just disappointed.
I was really hoping I'd do better.
Really?! That sucks.
Are you freaking kidding me?!
Well, I've already come this far...
It was a good game, but I guess I've had this coming.
It's almost a relief at this point!
There's no way to go back...
Hey, I don't mind! One person's forfeit is another person getting off.
Alright, here we go!
Just gotta position myself...
Need to get this just right...
Just need a minute...
Oh well, if that's the way it's gotta be...
Oh yeah, that's the spot!
This is the best!
Come on, just a little deeper...
Oh! That's it! Right there!
Yeah, that's the stuff...
It's so damn good!
Oh yeah, that's the good stuff!
Just what I needed...
Ha... yeah... almost...
Oh! Oh! Oh!
Come on, I'm almost there.
My world's about to break...!
Just about...!
This is it...!
Hnng...
I'm gonna... I'm gonna...
So close...
Wait, I'm not...
This is... this is...
I need this!
YES!
Yes, please!
I need this!
Finally!
Right there!
I'm rooting for you, ~playing~!
Give 'em hell,~playing~!
Well, that was embarrassing.
So now what? Do I just have to sit here like this?
This feels awkward now...
So this is awkward...
I'm fine... just give me a minute.
Tonight hasn't been so bad. I've certainly had worse team-ups!
Any chance I can towel off real quick? I'm soaking in my own juices here!
You just think you beat me. I'm actually a Life Model Decoy sent to investigate the Inventory! Yeah, that's it!
Brrr! Is it just me or is it a tit bit nipplely in here?
So I guess I'm just eye candy from this point forward? Great.
Yawn! I'm exhausted. I think I might... should... lie down a bit.
Now that I'm out I can really feel the weight of everyone's gazes...
This is a little embarrassing now that I don't have cards to focus on...
I'm stickier than Paste-Pot Pete now! Gross!
How much longer is this going to take? I'm naked and freezing here!
Well, that was easy.
Who wants to play again? Double or nothing!
Yeah, I know I'm the best. Just don't everyone start clapping and saying congratulations! That's creepy.
Time to make like a baby and head out!
Who wants to grab something to eat? I'm up for anything but chicken.
That's right! Don't mess with a Jersey girl!
Whew! You play a mean game, ~player~. You know what? You deserve this. Tell 'em Wasp sent ya. You'll fit right in.
GG, ~name~! I almost had you!
Ooh, so close! But this counts as a happy ending too.
Oh well. At least everyone had fun!
Well, that was an experience!
That was fun!
I wouldn't mind doing this again sometime!
Definitely an experience worth repeating!
